title: Disclaimer
p1aa: Map production: Global Malaria Programme. World Health Organization.
p2: Unless otherwise specifically stated, the information contained in this application has been made available to the World Health Organization (WHO) Global Malaria Programme by Ministries of Health or their development partners, or through extraction by WHO or contracted partners from publications in international peer-reviewed scientific journals. WHO therefore provides no assurance as to the validity, accuracy or completeness of this information.
p3a: Images and files generated from this application should be used only with reference to the subset displayed in accordance with the data filters applied. The following citation shall be conspicuously provided alongside images or files generated from the application: Source: WHO Malaria Threats Map: tracking biological challenges to malaria control and elimination (
